article_node.title: Isaiah Bond says he's signing with Cleveland Browns in social media post
article_node.summary: Former University of Texas wide receiver Isaiah Bond has announced his signing with the Cleveland Browns after going undrafted in the 2025 NFL Draft due to sexual assault allegations, which he maintains his innocence regarding. The Browns are looking to bolster their receiving corps, currently led by Jerry Jeudy and Cedric Tillman. Bond expressed gratitude for the opportunity to continue his NFL career, stating that the prosecutor has decided not to pursue charges against him.
